name: Switchometer
description:
Swap between Hot and Cold temperatures in this 2D Puzzle-Platformer! Your temperature changes your environment. Platforms melt when the temperature is hot, or freeze when the temperature is cold. 

This project was my original idea for the Global Game Jam, back in January. However, due to bad timing, it had to be delayed to Late April/May 2022. The original theme of the jam "Duality" was kept in mind throughout the game's development. 

Switchometer was created in 9 days for the 2022 Game Design Student Association (GDSA) Jam/Showcase, hosted by Fitchburg State University. An arcade port of the game was developed and released for the Arcade Machine at the university.
